00054 #define orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_NONE                0x00000000
00055 
00056 #define orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TIMESTAMP           0x00000001
00057 #define orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TYPE                0x00000002
00058 #define orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TAGGED              0x00000004
00059 
00060 #define orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_FILE                0x00000010
00061 #define orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_CONSOLE             0x00000020
00062 #define orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_GRAPHIC             0x00000040
00063 
00064 #define orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_MASK_DEFAULT             0x00000037
00065 
00066 #define orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_MASK_USER_ALL            0x0FFFFFFF

00072 #define orxDEBUG_KZ_DEFAULT_LOG_FILE                  "orx.log"
00073 #define orxDEBUG_KZ_DEFAULT_LOG_SUFFIX                ".log"
00074 #define orxDEBUG_KZ_DEFAULT_DEBUG_SUFFIX              "-debug.log"

00079 /* Log message, compiler specific */
00080 #ifdef __orxGCC__
00081 
00082   #define orxLOG(STRING, ...)                                                                                     \
00083   do                                                                                                              \
00084   {                                                                                                               \
00085     _orxDebug_BackupFlags();                                                                                      \
00086     _orxDebug_SetFlags(orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_CONSOLE                                                          \
00087                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_FILE                                                             \
00088                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TYPE                                                             \
00089                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TIMESTAMP,                                                       \
00090                        orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_MASK_USER_ALL);                                                       \
00091     _orxDebug_Log(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_LOG, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, ##__VA_ARGS__);  \
00092     _orxDebug_RestoreFlags();                                                                                     \
00093   } while(orxFALSE)
00094 
00095   #define orxLOG_CONSOLE(STRING, ...)                                                                             \
00096   do                                                                                                              \
00097   {                                                                                                               \
00098     _orxDebug_BackupFlags();                                                                                      \
00099     _orxDebug_SetFlags(orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_CONSOLE                                                          \
00100                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TYPE                                                             \
00101                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TIMESTAMP,                                                       \
00102                        orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_MASK_USER_ALL);                                                       \
00103     _orxDebug_Log(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_LOG, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, ##__VA_ARGS__);  \
00104     _orxDebug_RestoreFlags();                                                                                     \
00105   } while(orxFALSE)
00106 
00107   #define orxLOG_FILE(STRING, ...)                                                                                \
00108   do                                                                                                              \
00109   {                                                                                                               \
00110     _orxDebug_BackupFlags();                                                                                      \
00111     _orxDebug_SetFlags(orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_FILE                                                             \
00112                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TYPE                                                             \
00113                       |orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_FLAG_TIMESTAMP,                                                       \
00114                        orxDEBUG_KU32_STATIC_MASK_USER_ALL);                                                       \
00115     _orxDebug_Log(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_LOG, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, ##__VA_ARGS__);  \
00116     _orxDebug_RestoreFlags();                                                                                     \

00123   } while(orxFALSE)

00139     } while(orxFALSE)

00174 #define orxDEBUG_INIT()                       _orxDebug_Init()
00175 #define orxDEBUG_EXIT()                       _orxDebug_Exit()

00177 #ifdef __orxDEBUG__
00178 
00179   /* Debug print, compiler specific */
00180   #ifdef __orxGCC__
00181     #define orxDEBUG_PRINT(LEVEL, STRING, ...)  _orxDebug_Log(LEVEL, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00182   #else /* __orxGCC__ */
00183     #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00184       #define orxDEBUG_PRINT(LEVEL, STRING, ...)  _orxDebug_Log(LEVEL, (const orxSTRING)__FUNCTION__, __FILE__, __LINE__, STRING, __VA_ARGS__)
00185     #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00186   #endif /* __orcGCC__ */
00187 
00188   /* End platform specific */
00189 
00190   #define orxDEBUG_FLAG_SET(SET, UNSET)       _orxDebug_SetFlags(SET, UNSET)
00191   #define orxDEBUG_FLAG_BACKUP()              _orxDebug_BackupFlags()
00192   #define orxDEBUG_FLAG_RESTORE()             _orxDebug_RestoreFlags()
00193 
00194   /* Break */
00195   #define orxBREAK()                          _orxDebug_Break()
00196 
00197   /* Files */
00198   #define orxDEBUG_SETDEBUGFILE(FILE)         _orxDebug_SetDebugFile(FILE)
00199   #define orxDEBUG_SETLOGFILE(FILE)           _orxDebug_SetLogFile(FILE)
00200   #define orxDEBUG_SETBASEFILENAME(FILE)                      \
00201     do                                                        \
00202     {                                                         \
00203       orxCHAR   zBuffer[256];                                 \
00204       strncpy(zBuffer, FILE, 256);                            \
00205       strncat(zBuffer, orxDEBUG_KZ_DEFAULT_DEBUG_SUFFIX, 256);\
00206       _orxDebug_SetDebugFile(zBuffer);                        \
00207       strncpy(zBuffer, FILE, 256);                            \
00208       strncat(zBuffer, orxDEBUG_KZ_DEFAULT_LOG_SUFFIX, 256);  \
00209       _orxDebug_SetLogFile(zBuffer);                          \
00210     } while(orxFALSE)
00211 
00212   /* Assert */
00213   #ifdef __orxGCC__
00214     #define orxASSERT(TEST, ...)                                                                  \
00215       if(!(TEST))                                                                                 \
00216       {                                                                                           \
00217         orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_ASSERT, "[Assertion failed] : <" #TEST ">", ##__VA_ARGS__); \
00218         orxBREAK();                                                                               \
00219       }
00220   #else /* __orxGCC__ */
00221     #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00222       #define orxASSERT(TEST, ...)                                                                \
00223         if(!(TEST))                                                                               \
00224         {                                                                                         \
00225           orxDEBUG_PRINT(orxDEBUG_LEVEL_ASSERT, "[Assertion failed] : <" #TEST ">", __VA_ARGS__); \
00226           orxBREAK();                                                                             \
00227         }
00228     #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00229   #endif /* __orcGCC__ */
00230 
00231 #else /* __orxDEBUG__ */
00232 
00233   #define orxDEBUG_PRINT(LEVEL, STRING, ...)
00234 
00235   #define orxBREAK()
00236 
00237   #define orxDEBUG_SETDEBUGFILE(FILE)
00238   #define orxDEBUG_SETLOGFILE(FILE)           _orxDebug_SetLogFile(FILE)
00239   #define orxDEBUG_SETBASEFILENAME(FILE)                      \
00240     do                                                        \
00241     {                                                         \
00242       orxCHAR   zBuffer[256];                                 \
00243       strncpy(zBuffer, FILE, 256);                            \
00244       strncat(zBuffer, orxDEBUG_KZ_DEFAULT_LOG_SUFFIX, 256);  \
00245       _orxDebug_SetLogFile(zBuffer);                          \
00246     } while(orxFALSE)
00247 
00248   #define orxASSERT(TEST, ...)
00249 
00250   #define orxDEBUG_FLAG_SET(SET, UNSET)
00251   #define orxDEBUG_FLAG_BACKUP()
00252   #define orxDEBUG_FLAG_RESTORE()
00253 
00254 #endif /* __orxDEBUG__ */

00270 /* *** Debug types. *** */
00271 typedef enum __orxDEBUG_LEVEL_t
00272 {
00273   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_ANIM = 0,                    
00274   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_CLOCK,                       
00275   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_DISPLAY,                     
00276   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_FILE,                        
00277   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_INPUT,                       
00278   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_JOYSTICK,                    
00279   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_KEYBOARD,                    
00280   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_MEMORY,                      
00281   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_MOUSE,                       
00282   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_OBJECT,                      
00283   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_PARAM,                       
00284   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_PHYSICS,                     
00285   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_PLUGIN,                      
00286   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_PROFILER,                    
00287   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_RENDER,                      
00288   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SCREENSHOT,                  
00289   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SOUND,                       
00290   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_SYSTEM,                      
00291   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_TIMER,                       
00293   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_USER,                        
00295   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_LOG,                         
00297   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_ASSERT,                      
00298   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_CRITICAL_ASSERT,             
00300   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_NUMBER,
00301 
00302   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_MAX_NUMBER = 32,
00303 
00304   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_ALL = 0xFFFFFFFE,            
00306   orxDEBUG_LEVEL_NONE = orxENUM_NONE
00307 
00308 } orxDEBUG_LEVEL;
